item.title: April-May 2022
item.description:
See here the schedule for our 3rd block of 2022!! We will update it with the talks title and the abstracts.

As usual, talks will be streamed on Crowdcast

27th of April, 5pm CET

Tatsuya Tsukahara: “Transcriptional adaptation couples past experience and future sensory responses” - Datta Lab, Harvary Medical School. Abstract | Replay

Stephane Bugeon: “A transcriptomic axis predicts state modulation of cortical interneurons” - Harris/Carandini Lab, UCL. Abstract | Replay

11th of May, 5pm CET

SPECIAL EVENT: A conversation about failure in science

Featuring talks and a panel discussion with:

Edvard Moser (NTNU, Norway)

Sara Solla (Northwestern University, USA)

Nachum Ulanovsky (Weizmann Institute, Israel)

Replay

18th of May, 5pm CET

Megha Sehgal: “Co-allocation to overlapping dendritic branches in the retrosplenial cortex integrates memories across time” - Silva Lab, UCLA. Abstract

Danil Tyulmankov: “Meta-learning synaptic plasticity and memory addressing for continual familiarity detection” - Abbott Lab, Columbia University. Abstract
